parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the plug-in. The description can contain a maximum of 200 characters in length.

parameters.name: PluginData
parameters.description: The statement that is used to modify the plug-in definition.

parameters.name: PluginId
parameters.description: The ID of the plug-in whose information you want to modify.

parameters.name: PluginName
parameters.description: The name of the plug-in. The name must be 4 to 50 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, and underscores (\_). However, it cannot start with an underscore.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tag of objects that match the rule. You can specify multiple tags.
